unnormalised: Arre yaar, heard about the Sharma case? IPC Section 304, right? Manslaughter. Adv. Verma is fighting for them, I think. Hope they get some relief, even though the evidence is pretty damning. Heard the verdict is expected by 15/07/2024. Let's see what the judge says!
normalised: Arre yaar, heard about the Sharma case? I-P-C Section three hundred and four, right? Manslaughter. Advocate Verma is fighting for them, I think. Hope they get some relief, even though the evidence is pretty damning. Heard the verdict is expected by fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four. Let's see what the judge says!
